description:
Build a mobile-friendly website right from your smartphone – in minutes. With GoDaddy GoMobile, it’s simple.

Not a tech wizard? Not a problem. Absolutely no technical skills are required to create an instant website that looks great on mobile devices, tablets, even desktops. The coolest part – you do it from the convenience of your smartphone, anytime, anywhere!

How easy is it? Simply:
- Choose a design from a catalogue of professionally designed templates
- Customize your website with your own text, photos and videos
- Rely on responsive design to look fantastic on desktops, smartphones and tablets
- Help customers contact you with useful built-in tools like location maps, click-to-call, click-to-email and more
- Add social sharing buttons to keep customers engaged and informed
- Create a brand-new domain name or use your existing web address for your GoMobile site
- Build and preview your site prior to paying. It’s all free until you’re ready to go live
releaseNotes:
New HTML rich text editor
Image picker now supports multi-select
iOS8 compatibility
Bug fixes and UI tweaks
